price: ߝߋ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߭ ߥߣߊ߬ߙߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ( ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ) ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
